verses.verse: The burden <S%H9294><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is against the land <S%H776><s%> of Hadrach, <S%H2317><s%> with Damascus <S%H1834><s%> as its resting <S%H4496><s%> place <S%H4496><s%> (for the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> especially of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are toward the Lord <S%H3068><s%>),
And Hamath <S%H2574><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> which borders <S%H1379><s%> on it; Tyre <S%H6865><s%> and Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they are very <S%H3966><s%> wise. <S%H2449><s%>

For Tyre <S%H6865><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> herself a fortress <S%H4692><s%> And piled <S%H6651><s%> up silver <S%H3701><s%> like dust, <S%H6083><s%> And gold <S%H2742><s%> like the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> will dispossess <S%H3423><s%> her And cast <S%H5221><s%> her wealth <S%H2428><s%> into the sea; <S%H3220><s%> And she will be consumed <S%H398><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> [it] and be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> too will writhe <S%H9123><s%> in great <S%H3966><s%> pain; <S%H9123><s%> Also Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> for her expectation <S%H4007><s%> has been <S%H954><s%> confounded. <S%H954><s%> Moreover, the king <S%H4428><s%> will perish from Gaza, <S%H6><s%> And Ashkelon <S%H5804><s%> will not be inhabited. <S%H831><s%>

And a mongrel <S%H4464><s%> race <S%H4464><s%> will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> And I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And I will remove <S%H5493><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> from their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And their detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> their teeth. <S%H8127><s%> Then they also <S%H1571><s%> will be a remnant <S%H7604><s%> for our God, <S%H430><s%> And be like a clan <S%H441><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And Ekron <S%H6138><s%> like a Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

But I will camp <S%H2583><s%> around My house <S%H1004><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of an army, <S%H4675><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of him who passes <S%H5674><s%> by and returns; <S%H7725><s%> And no <S%H3808><s%> oppressor <S%H5065><s%> will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them anymore, <S%H5750><s%> For now <S%H6258><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> with My eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> [in triumph,] O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem! <S%H3389><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your king <S%H4428><s%> is coming <S%H935><s%> to you; He is just <S%H6662><s%> and endowed <S%H3467><s%> with salvation, <S%H3467><s%> Humble, <S%H6041><s%> and mounted <S%H7392><s%> on a donkey, <S%H2543><s%> Even on a colt, <S%H5895><s%> the foal <S%H1121><s%> of a donkey. <S%H860><s%>

And I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> from Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> And the horse <S%H5483><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> And the bow <S%H7198><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%> And He will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the nations; <S%H1471><s%> And His dominion <S%H4915><s%> will be from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea, <S%H3220><s%> And from the River <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

As for you also, <S%H1571><s%> because of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of [My] covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, I have set <S%H7971><s%> your prisoners <S%H615><s%> free <S%H7971><s%> from the waterless <S%H369><s%> <S%H4325><s%> pit. <S%H953><s%>

Return <S%H7725><s%> to the stronghold, <S%H1225><s%> O prisoners <S%H615><s%> who have the hope; <S%H8615><s%> This very <S%H1571><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> I am declaring <S%H5046><s%> that I will restore <S%H7725><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> to you.

For I will bend <S%H1869><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> as My bow, <S%H7198><s%> I will fill <S%H4390><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> with Ephraim. <S%H669><s%> And I will stir <S%H5782><s%> up your sons, <S%H1121><s%> O Zion, <S%H6726><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your sons, <S%H1121><s%> O Greece; <S%H3120><s%> And I will make <S%H7760><s%> you like a warrior's sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will appear <S%H7200><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, And His arrow <S%H2671><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> like lightning; <S%H1300><s%> And the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> will blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> And will march <S%H1980><s%> in the storm <S%H9370><s%> winds <S%H9370><s%> of the south. <S%H8486><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will defend <S%H1598><s%> them. And they will devour, <S%H398><s%> and trample <S%H3533><s%> on the sling <S%H9521><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> And they will drink, <S%H8354><s%> [and] be boisterous <S%H1993><s%> as with wine; <S%H3196><s%> And they will be filled <S%H4390><s%> like a [sacrificial] basin, <S%H4219><s%> [Drenched] like the corners <S%H2106><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> them in that day <S%H3117><s%> As the flock <S%H6629><s%> of His people; <S%H5971><s%> For [they are as] the stones <S%H68><s%> of a crown, <S%H5145><s%> Sparkling <S%H5264><s%> in His land. <S%H127><s%>

For what <S%H4100><s%> comeliness <S%H2898><s%> and beauty <S%H3308><s%> [will be] theirs! Grain <S%H1715><s%> will make the young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> flourish, <S%H5107><s%> and new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> the virgins. <S%H1330><s%>
